item.title: Inqilab Mancha provides first update from Singapore on Hadi’s condition
item.description: The condition of Inqilab Mancha convener Sharif Osman Hadi, who was looking to run in the upcoming election as an independent candidate, had deteriorated slightly according to primary tests upon reaching Singapore, but is now stable......

item.title: Anti-independence forces trying to resurface on Victory Day, Fakhrul says
item.description: BNP Secretary General Mirza Fakhrul Islam Alamgir on Tuesday said the forces that opposed Bangladesh’s independence in 1971 are once again trying to raise their heads....
